source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: How to Draw the Earth and the Moon
items.headline: Spacescape Painting from Scratch
objectives_summary: Learn to draw spasescapes
Learn to blend colored pencils

items.title: Watercolor Painting Workbook: Pink Flamingos in 6 Styles
items.headline: Explore different styles you can paint watercolor in and discover your own favorite style!
objectives_summary: The difference between realistic, impressionistic, mixed, illustration, alla-prima, grissaile styles.
Main features of each style and what makes it stand out
Specifically watercolor techniques you need to use to create in a particular style (you can't use the same techniques if you paint, for example, in oil)

items.title: Make Projecting Animals Pendants and their Molds

visible_instructors.title: Maha Atef
visible_instructors.name: Maha
visible_instructors.job_title: Polymer Clay Artist - Founder at Selsal

items.headline: You'll learn how to sculpt 2D polymer clay designs on pendants. And you'll learn how to make molds for your designs too.
objectives_summary: Make necklaces and pendants with 2D projecting animals and make their molds too.
Use polymer clay to make molds and be able to make replicates easily.
If you're a beginner you'll gain the basic knowledge about polymer clay first.

items.title: Learn To Draw Sea Life - Dolphin, Shark and Killer Whale
items.headline: Learn how to draw 3 stunning Sea Life pictures - a Dolphin, Shark and Killer Whale. Get AMAZING results with our lessons
objectives_summary: How to use Pastel Pencil Techniques to Draw Sea Life
Apply the light to dark rule when layering pastel tones
Be able to apply the techniques learnt to their own pictures

items.title: Learn Arabic Calligraphy: Maghribi Mabsut Style
items.headline: A step-by-step course to learn the Maghribi Mabsut style in a simple and easy way.
objectives_summary: You will learn the Maghribi Mabsut Script
How to prepare your own bamboo - reed pen
Write Arabic single alphabets in Maghribi Mabsut style

items.title: Compose and Draw large Crowd Scenes & Facial Expressions

visible_instructors.title: Hobitute  Artists
visible_instructors.name: Hobitute
visible_instructors.job_title: Your art Guru, Artists at Hobitute

items.headline: Composing and Drawing Large Crowd Scenes and creating Fourteen Facial expressions of human-being
objectives_summary: The course has several lectures that are being taught by experienced artists who have taken pains to explain even the minute techniques, thus making it very easy for the learner to follow the concepts and practice

The course provides the learners a good understanding of the perspective and techniques of composing and drawing large crowd scenes. The lessons on various facial expressions gives additional power to the learner to add emotions in the face of people who assembled.
By completing all the levels under this course, the learners would understand the complexity of the subject and would learn the techniques of bringing energy and life to their drawings

items.title: Watercolor Painting – The Direct Approach

visible_instructors.title: Arie Swanepoel
visible_instructors.name: Arie
visible_instructors.job_title: I am a Watercolorist and Art Instructor.

items.headline: Painting Wildlife
objectives_summary: What is important in creating free flowing watercolors with the direct approach.
Planning the painting, the format, viewpoint, and the focal point.
You will do valuable exercises to improve your skills with the direct approach.

items.title: FUN with Viviva Watercolors!
items.headline: with Diane Flick
objectives_summary: How to paint a simple, vibrant flower using Viviva watercolors.

items.title: How to make a Wood Sliced Christmas Ornament
items.headline: Decorate your tree. Use on a gift bag. Use as a place setting.
objectives_summary: You'll be able to create cute wood sliced Christmas ornaments.

items.title: Portrait in colored pencils on sanded paper
items.headline: Colored pencils on sanded paper, with the Brush and Pencil supplies
objectives_summary: You will learn to draw this beautiful portrait of the old lady, with colored pencils on sanded paper

items.title: Abstract Techniques Revealed Vol. 3 - Acrylic, Resin & More

visible_instructors.title: Gino Savarino
visible_instructors.name: Gino
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional abstract artist, gallery owner and instructor

items.headline: The Fun and easy way to create modern art with epoxy resin. Also,  painting and layering images similar to street art
objectives_summary: Paint 2 large colorful modern art pieces with epoxy resin and mixed media layering.
Have the confidence you are looking for to create 2 contemporary paintings without spending a fortune on tools and materials..
Have fun with right to the point instructions and without the complicated, art jargon. Learn with a loose and carefree approach and without judgement.

items.title: Oil Pastel Secrets to Realistic Paintings - Advanced

visible_instructors.title: Raju Dyapur
visible_instructors.name: Raju
visible_instructors.job_title: Author, Visual Artist and Mathematics Coach

items.headline: An ultimate detailed course to improve and master your skills using Oil Pastels
objectives_summary: Using oil pastels for more realistic coloring/painting
Understand the concepts of perspective Drawing
Understanding Light Source

items.title: Pencil drawing-Techniques for beginners and beyond
items.headline: Basic drawing skills for beginners and beyond
objectives_summary: How to use pencils and pens correctly
How to shade correctly
How to draw correctly in perspective

items.title: Crochet Amigurumi - Learn to make Dave the Dog
items.headline: Discover the basics of amigurumi crochet and make your very own character
objectives_summary: How to create an amigurumi crochet project
How to work the magic circle technique
How to read a basic amigurumi pattern

items.title: Watercolour Nature Journal - 1
items.headline: 6 ways to paint water, waves and ripples
objectives_summary: You'll have the confidence to illustrate a body of water including the waves and ripples that appear on the surface. This knowledge can be transferred to any body of water.
You'll learn how to illustrate a simple journal page using watercolour and text to capture your memories.
You'll understand some basic principles about illustrating a body of water pertaining to light and shadows to enhance your illustrations.

items.title: Watercolor-Learn to paint Fruits & Vegetable in 3 easy steps
items.headline: Watercolor Painting - Learn to draw and paint Fruits & Vegetables in 3 easy and effective steps
objectives_summary: How to draw Fruits and Vegetables easily and effectively in 3 easy steps
How to do sketching before applying the paint.
Identify true colors of Fruits and Vegetables.
